verbs.description: [ARG0: Republican U.S. Senator John McCain] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARG1: the Senate should reject President Donald Trump 's nominee to lead the Central Intelligence Agency] .
Republican U.S. Senator John McCain said on Wednesday the Senate [V: should] reject President Donald Trump 's nominee to lead the Central Intelligence Agency .
